body_html:
Great!
Quick question: to build a new CUDA 9.0+cuDNN v7 container image with the new Dockerfiles, what magic value of TF_DOCKER_BUILD_CENTRAL_PIP do I need to pass to parameterized_docker_build.sh?

body:
Great!
Quick question: to build a new CUDA 9.0+cuDNN v7 container image with the new Dockerfiles, what magic value of `TF_DOCKER_BUILD_CENTRAL_PIP` do I need to pass to `parameterized_docker_build.sh`?
